biotools.summary: T7 RNAi Oligo Designer (TROD) aids in the design of DNA oligonucleotides for short interfering RNA (siRNA) synthesis with T7 RNA polymerase.  It takes an input of a cDNA sequence and outputs a list of DNA oligos for ordering.

bioschemas.name: TROD
bioschemas.summary: T7 RNAi Oligo Designer (TROD) aids in the design of DNA oligonucleotides for short interfering RNA (siRNA) synthesis with T7 RNA polymerase.  It takes an input of a cDNA sequence and outputs a list of DNA oligos for ordering.
